law.history: Repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 400, sec. 4, effective July 1, 2000. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 345, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 3, effective May 24, 1991.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Sales and use tax credit -- Qualifications -- Amount -- Reporting requirements.
